trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 管理 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> class is used as a container for a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>類別會當做容器使用的集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> class derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> class, such that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> class can also contain a collection of visual objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>類別，使得<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>類別也可以包含視覺物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object that is used as the parent for two <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>做為兩個父代的物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>物件。

trans-unit.source: Objects that are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object must be added in reverse z-order (bottom to top) to ensure they are rendering in the correct drawing order.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入的物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>必須反向疊置順序 （從下至上） 加入物件，以確保它們會呈現正確的繪圖順序。

trans-unit.source: In order for the visual tree to be enumerated correctly, the example provides overridden implementations of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.GetVisualChild%2A> method and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓正確列舉的視覺化樹狀結構，這個範例將提供的覆寫的實作<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.GetVisualChild%2A>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object, and then add child visual objects to it.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>物件，並將子 visual 物件新增到它。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect" /> value for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The bitmap effect for this visual object.
trans-unit.target: 這個視覺物件的點陣圖效果。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectInput" /> value for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectInput" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The bitmap effect input value for this visual object.
trans-unit.target: 這個視覺物件的點陣圖效果輸入值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a cached representation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的快取表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode" /> that holds a cached representation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 保存 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode" /> 之快取表示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.CacheMode%2A> property when you need to increase performance for content that is time-consuming to render.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.CacheMode%2A>屬性，當您需要以提高效能相當耗時呈現的內容。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the child collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的子集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection" /> that contains the children of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的子系。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection> from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection>從<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the clipping region of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的裁剪區域。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> that defines the clipping region.
trans-unit.target: 定義裁剪區域的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding box for the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 內容的週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that specifies the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 指定週框方塊的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.DescendantBounds%2A> property to return the union of all the content bounding boxes for all of the descendants of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object, but not the object itself.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.DescendantBounds%2A>屬性來傳回所有下階的週框方塊的所有內容的聯集<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>物件，但不是物件本身。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve the bounding rectangle of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取週框矩形<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the union of all the content bounding boxes for all of the descendants of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />, but not including the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 之所有子代的所有內容週框方塊聯集，但不包括 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that specifies the combination bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 指定組合週框方塊的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />。

trans-unit.source: Get the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.ContentBounds%2A> property to return the cached bounding box rectangle for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> itself.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.ContentBounds%2A>屬性傳回的快取的週框方塊矩形<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>本身。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve the bounding rectangle of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object's descendants.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取週框矩形<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>物件的下階。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bitmap effect to apply to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的點陣圖效果。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect" /> that represents the bitmap effect.
trans-unit.target: 表示點陣圖效果的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that represents the index value of the child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數 (Signed Integer)，表示子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The value of <c>index</c> must be between 0 and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount" /> - 1.
trans-unit.target: <c>index</c> 的值必須介於 0 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount" /> - 1 之間。

trans-unit.source: Returns a specified child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> for the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回父 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 的已指定子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />。

trans-unit.source: The child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />.
trans-unit.target: 子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> does not have any children.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>並沒有任何子系。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object that is used as the parent for two <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>做為兩個父代的物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>物件。

trans-unit.source: Objects that are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object must be added in reverse z-order (bottom to top) to ensure they are rendering in the correct drawing order.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入的物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>必須反向疊置順序 （從下至上） 加入物件，以確保它們會呈現正確的繪圖順序。

trans-unit.source: In order for the visual tree to be enumerated correctly, the example provides overridden implementations of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.GetVisualChild%2A> method and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓正確列舉的視覺化樹狀結構，這個範例將提供的覆寫的實作<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.GetVisualChild%2A>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The visual tree cannot be modified during this call.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫時，無法修改的視覺化樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Return top-most visual object of a hit test.
trans-unit.target: 傳回點擊測試最上層的視覺物件。

trans-unit.source: The point value to hit test.
trans-unit.target: 要進行點擊測試的點值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the top-most visual object of a hit test by specifying a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: 藉由指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />，傳回點擊測試最上層的視覺物件。

trans-unit.source: The hit test result of the visual returned as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 視覺物件的點擊測試結果會傳回做為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A> property of the return value represents the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> object that was hit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A>屬性的傳回值表示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>已叫用的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult> return value from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.HitTest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult>傳回值，從<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.HitTest%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The delegate that allows you to ignore parts of the visual tree that you are not interested in processing in your hit test results.
trans-unit.target: 委派，可讓您忽略點擊測試結果中處理時不感興趣的視覺化樹狀結構組件。

trans-unit.source: The delegate that is used to control the return of hit test information.
trans-unit.target: 用來控制如何傳回點擊測試資訊的委派。

trans-unit.source: Defines the set of parameters for a hit test.
trans-unit.target: 定義點擊測試的參數集。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a hit test on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> by using the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback" /> 物件，對 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 起始點擊測試。

trans-unit.source: The `filterCallback` parameter can be null, in which case, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: `filterCallback`參數可以是 null，在此情況下，它會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If `filterCallback` is not `null`, it is invoked before `resultCallback`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`filterCallback`不`null`，它會叫用之前`resultCallback`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> from its reference point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 距離其參考點的位移值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> that represents the offset value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的位移值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />, based on 0=transparent, 1=opaque.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的不透明度 (根據 0=透明，1=不透明)。

trans-unit.source: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies a range from fully transparent to fully opaque.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 1 的值，指定的範圍為完全透明到完全不透明。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> is completely opaque.
trans-unit.target: 值為 0 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 完全透明，值為 1 則表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 完全不透明。

trans-unit.source: A value 0.5 indicates 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 值為 0.5 表示半透明，值為 0.725 則表示 72.5% 不透明，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: 小於 0 的值視為 0，而大於 1 的值則視為 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brush that specifies a possible opacity mask for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定筆刷，這個筆刷指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 可能的不透明遮罩。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that represents the opacity mask value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> 的值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的不透明遮罩值。

trans-unit.source: Opacity masks can be used to create effects such as vignettes, based on the alpha channel values of the brush.
trans-unit.target: 不透明度遮罩可以用來建立這類 vignettes，根據的筆刷的 alpha 色板值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 的父 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />。

trans-unit.source: The parent of the visual.
trans-unit.target: 視覺物件的父代。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is returned as <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>, rather than a raw object.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這會當做傳回<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>，而不是原始物件。

trans-unit.source: This property might return `null` in a disconnected tree, or if you have traversed to the tree root at the window level.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可能會傳回`null`在中斷連線的樹狀目錄中，或如果您有周遊樹狀結構根目錄視窗層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the transform that is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的轉換。

trans-unit.source: The transform value.
trans-unit.target: 轉換值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> is a base class that unifies many different forms of transforms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> 是基底類別，可統一許多不同的形式的轉換。

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of children for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的子系數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of children in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 中的子系數目。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> does not have any children.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>並沒有任何子系。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object that is used as the parent for two <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>做為兩個父代的物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>物件。

trans-unit.source: Objects that are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object must be added in reverse z-order (bottom to top) to ensure they are rendering in the correct drawing order.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入的物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>必須反向疊置順序 （從下至上） 加入物件，以確保它們會呈現正確的繪圖順序。

trans-unit.source: In order for the visual tree to be enumerated correctly, the example provides overridden implementations of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.GetVisualChild%2A> method and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓正確列舉的視覺化樹狀結構，這個範例將提供的覆寫的實作<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.GetVisualChild%2A>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> must implement the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount" /> property to enumerate the visual children.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />必須實作<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount" />列舉 visual 的子系的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The derived property must return the number of children for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的屬性必須傳回的子系數目<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />。

trans-unit.source: The visual tree cannot be modified during this call.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫時，無法修改的視覺化樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X (horizontal) guideline for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的 X (水平) 導線。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal guideline.
trans-unit.target: 水平導線。

trans-unit.source: Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels.
trans-unit.target: 像素貼齊是使裝置特定像素呈現物件邊緣內容版面配置固定的程序。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 圖形系統會使用裝置獨立單位來啟用解析度和裝置獨立性。

trans-unit.source: Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting.
trans-unit.target: 每個裝置獨立像素都會依系統的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定自動進行調整。

trans-unit.source: This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware.
trans-unit.target: 這讓 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 應用程式針對不同的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定進行適當調整，並自動讓應用程式感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]獨立性可以建立異常的邊緣轉譯，因為消除鋸齒。

trans-unit.source: These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels.
trans-unit.target: 這些成品，通常被視為模糊或 「 軟式 」 的邊緣，就會發生的邊緣位置落在裝置像素，而不是裝置像素之間。

trans-unit.source: To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決此問題，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供方法的 「 對齊 」 裝置像素，透過像素貼齊、 貼至視覺化樹狀結構中的物件邊緣消除柔和消除鋸齒所產生的邊界。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Y (vertical) guideline for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual" /> 的 Y (垂直) 導線。

trans-unit.source: The vertical guideline.
trans-unit.target: 垂直導線。

trans-unit.source: Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels.
trans-unit.target: 像素貼齊是使裝置特定像素呈現物件邊緣內容版面配置固定的程序。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 圖形系統會使用裝置獨立單位來啟用解析度和裝置獨立性。

trans-unit.source: Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting.
trans-unit.target: 每個裝置獨立像素都會依系統的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定自動進行調整。

trans-unit.source: This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware.
trans-unit.target: 這讓 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 應用程式針對不同的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定進行適當調整，並自動讓應用程式感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]獨立性可以建立異常的邊緣轉譯，因為消除鋸齒。

trans-unit.source: These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels.
trans-unit.target: 這些成品，通常被視為模糊或 「 軟式 」 的邊緣，就會發生的邊緣位置落在裝置像素，而不是裝置像素之間。

trans-unit.source: To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決此問題，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供方法的 「 對齊 」 裝置像素，透過像素貼齊、 貼至視覺化樹狀結構中的物件邊緣消除柔和消除鋸齒所產生的邊界。
